overview: While challenging common beliefs on the history of civilization, the film takes the audience back to 12 thousand years ago, to Gobeklitepe, an ancient site recently found in SanliUrfa, Turkiye. With its brilliant graphics and interviews with experts, the film shows how old taboos come tumbling down as we keep scratching the surface.
tagline: 12.000 years ago there already was a sacred place on Earth.
title: Gobeklitepe: The World's First Temple
